title: Barcelona's Financial Soap Opera
description:
The FC crew break down another episode in Barcelona's financial situation after reports indicated that the club threatened legal action over Frenkie de Jong's contract due to criminality by the previous board. Plus, the guys react to Adrien Rabiot being linked with Manchester United and question why the Red Devils would want to bring in another underperforming player to their squad.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Barcelona threaten legal action over Frenkie de Jong's contract; Manchester United linked with Adrien Rabiot; Jack Grealish struggles for chemistry with Erling Haaland
